sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, Output, EventEmitter, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { UsersService } from '../users.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-map-search', templateUrl: './map-search.component.html', styleUrls: ['./map-search.component.css'] }) export class MapSearchComponent { title = 'Where in the world?' officialName = '' population = '' region = '' capital = '' flag = '' constructor(private user: UsersService){} ngOnInit() { this.user.getMoreData().subscribe(data => { let dataSet = Object.entries(data)[0][1] this.officialName = dataSet.name.official this.flag = dataSet.flags.png this.population = dataSet.population this.region = dataSet.region this.capital = dataSet.capital console.log(dataSet.region) }) } }

{{title}}

{{officialName}}

Population: {{ population }}

Region: {{ population }}

Capital: {{ population }}
